description:
Deliver the Dream provides structured, therapeutic, fun activities for families experiencing a serious illness or crisis on a three-day, two-night retreat weekend experience. Each retreat is geared towards a specific illness/crisis such as epilepsy, spina bifida, death of a loved one, down syndrome and cancer.

Retreat program is also available for combat veterans who are returning home along with their families.
name: DELIVER THE DREAM, INC.
